review_data.title: superleckere küche

review_data.title: Overpriced and missing the details
review_data.content: My Partner and two of our friends recently had Dinner at the newly opened Hofwiesen, which is beautifully designed. The staff were friendly and helpful with the menu, but that is as far as it goes. There was no management (Maitre de) visible which was...More
